summary: Veterinary case management app with Dashboard and Cases pages. Currently debugging a critical issue where the database is not loading (blank page) in both Draft and Live versions. Investigating backend (Motoko canister) and frontend (React/TypeScript) fetch failures.
architectural_notes: Backend uses Motoko canisters on ICP; frontend uses React/TypeScript
known_issues: Database not loading in Draft or Live app â€” blank page; fetch from canister failing

new_feature_requests.summary: Audit the backend Motoko actor (backend/main.mo) and verify that all public query and update methods are correctly defined, exported, and free of runtime errors that could cause the canister to silently fail on fetch. Fix any issues found (e.g., missing or mis-typed return types, broken async flows, actor initialization errors).

Audit frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts and frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts to verify the actor is correctly instantiated and all React Query fetch hooks are properly wired to the canister methods. Fix any broken canister method calls, incorrect actor references, missing await/async handling, or type mismatches that cause fetches to silently fail and produce a blank page.

Audit the Dashboard page (frontend/src/features/dashboard/components/DashboardView.tsx) and Cases list page (frontend/src/features/cases/components/CasesListView.tsx) to ensure they correctly consume the React Query hooks, handle loading and error states, and never render a blank page when data is unavailable. Add or fix error boundary / fallback UI so any fetch failure displays a meaningful message rather than a blank screen.

Check frontend/src/App.tsx for any authentication-gating logic or conditional rendering that might prevent the Dashboard or Cases pages from mounting before a user profile is loaded, causing a blank page for returning authenticated users. Fix any race conditions or missing guard clauses.
